original_text: And Ephraim is as an heifer that is taught, and loveth to tread out the corn; but I passed over upon her fair neck: I will make Ephraim to ride; Judah shall plow, and Jacob shall break his clods.
korean_text: 에브라임은 마치 길들인 암소 같아서 곡식 밟기를 좋아하나 내가 그의 아름다운 목에 멍에를 메우고 에브라임 위에 사람을 태우리니 유다가 밭을 갈고 야곱이 흙덩이를 깨뜨리리라

sentences.original_text: And Ephraim is as an heifer
and loveth to tread out the corn
but I passed over upon her fair neck
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 그의 아름다운 목을 지나쳤고

sentences.original_text: I will make Ephraim to ride
and Jacob shall break his clods
